sentences.sContent: Check and adjust the brakes regularly.
sentences.sCn: 经常检查并调节刹车装置。

sentences.sContent: Taste the soup and adjust the seasoning.
sentences.sCn: 尝尝汤的味道，然后调整佐料用量。

sentences.sContent: If your employment status changes, your tax code will be adjusted accordingly.
sentences.sCn: 如果就业状况改变，你的免税代码也会作相应调整。

words.tran: [自] 调节器；调停者；（保险等）理算员

remMethod.val: ad ＋ just(正确的) → 使正确 → 调节； 校正

trans.tranOther: to change or move something slightly to improve it or make it more suitable for a particular purpose
